items.title: Computer Science Student Union
items.description: As the Senior Graphic Designer for the University of Toronto Computer Science Student Union, a complete rebranding of the union's website and materials was issued.

items.title: CDF Labs
items.description: A simple Android app that scrapes and presents data regarding the availability of lab computers and printers at UofT.

items.title: Colour New Tab
items.description: A simple, yet customizable, new tab page replacement.

items.title: MyLiveNotes by Crescendum
items.description: A web app designed for academic reading.

items.title: Jon & Nick
items.description: A single page responsive website designed for an election campaign.

items.title: Sherlocke
items.description: A web app that utilized IBM Watson to present relevant legal documents while browsing CanLII.

items.title: The MarkUs Project
items.description: An overhaul of the web app's visual design.

items.title: Ultraviolet
items.description: A simple steganography Chrome app created during PennApps Spring 2014.

items.title: Cryptr
items.description: An intuitive encryption Chrome extension. Winner of UofTHacks 2013.
